txt.en:
As Midsummer's Day approaches, the peoples of Middle-earth gather for the festival of Midsummer. Word has spread of a great celebration in Minas Tirith, and all have been invited.

Revel in the celebration of dance, merriment, and love with your family and fellows!

<rgb=#FF0000>Note: After accepting this quest, you will receive a map. Use the map to travel to Minas Tirith and join in the celebration of Midsummer. Smaller celebrations can also be found in Ered Luin, Bree-land, the Shire, and on the island of Furtherholm.</rgb>

By order of King Elessar, the gates of Minas Tirith stand open to welcome all who wish to celebrate Midsummer! Come and join in the revelry!\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Note: After accepting this quest, you will receive a map. Use the map to travel to Minas Tirith and join in the celebration of Midsummer. Smaller celebrations can also be found in Ered Luin, Bree-land, the Shire, and the island of Furtherholm. Transportation to Furtherholm can be found in Minas Tirith, as well as other festival locations.</rgb>
The Festival of Midsummer Has Arrived!

As Midsummer's Day approaches, the peoples of Middle-earth come together to celebrate the great festival of Midsummer. Revel in the celebration of dance, merriment, and love with your family and fellows!
Complete to receive a map to celebrate Midsummer in Minas Tirith!

As Midsummer's Day approaches, the peoples of Middle-earth come together to celebrate the great festival of Midsummer. Revel in the celebration of dance, merriment, and love with your family and fellows!
Complete to receive a map to celebrate Midsummer in Minas Tirith!

The greatest of all Midsummer celebrations can be found in Minas Tirith!\n\nAs Midsummer's Day approaches, the peoples of Middle-earth come together to celebrate the great festival of Midsummer. Revel in the celebration of dance, merriment, and love with your family and fellows!
